response.original_title: Essa festa é a minha vida
response.overview: Accompanying a dawn near Piteco, personality of the Recôncavo da Bahia, this film records from another angle the famous and awaited Festa da Nossa Senhora D'Ajuda, in Cachoeira. The intimacy of the conversation, the care of the makeup, the adjustments to the costumes… everything makes this film a precious and delicate portrait of a star. A quote by Piteco inspires the title of the short film, “this party is my life”, a phrase that reveals the ethical dimension of those who save themselves the whole year to surrender and brighten the D'Ajuda packages.
response.title: This party is my life
